column2: What prescription medications are you currently taking for the health conditions and symptoms you face that you are actively trying to reduce the use of by using cannabis? (Please select all that apply)

column1: I have reduced my prescription medication use in the past
Over the counter (OTC) medications (e.g. Ibuprofen, Acetaminophen, sleep aids, allergy medications, Tylenol)
Antidepressants (eg. Lexapro, Prozac, Wellbutrin, Effexor, Nortriptyline)
I'm not trying to reduce any medication use
Mood Stabilizers/Anticonvulsants (e.g. Lamictal, Gapapentin, Keppra, Topzmax)
